channel.title: Item requirement to talk
channel.description:
I tried to write a string of code where you can't talk to this guy unless you have all of these items but it never reads it correctly how else would I format this?
this is what I have now
[code]if (playerHasItem(536) == true || playerHasItem(3325) == true || playerHasItem(2377) == true || playerHasItem(7477) == true)[/code]
thanks![br][size=1]Posted at: December 21, 2006, 07:36:34 PM[/size][hr].
